title: Bug 31627: Core dump occurs when changing perspective after adding a DBCS project to the workspace
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver.: IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: Changing perspective leads to a core dump after adding a DBCS project to the workspace.

Description:
Steps to recreate problem:
OB: After adding a DBCS project to the workspace, attempting to change the perspective results in a core dump.
EB: Changing perspectives should not lead to a core dump after adding a DBCS project to the workspace.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse with the mentioned configurations.
2. Add a DBCS project to the workspace.
3. Attempt to change the perspective within Eclipse.
4. Observe the core dump occurring.
